description: HPT files are similar to .HFT files. Both files are used as templates which can be filled with user answers. Once filled, the HPT template can then be saved as an .HPD (HotDocs PDF Document) and printed.
NOTE: The HPT format is PDF-based. HotDocs also supports another page layout format called Envoy, which was an early competitor to the PDF format. Envoy-based templates use the .HFT extension.
